dc_description_s: Apollo, Armstrong County, Pa, June 1894. 1 map on 5 sheets : col. ; on sheets 64 x 54 cm. Statement of responsibility: Sanborn-Perris Map Co., Limited.  Partial cadastral map.  Title from sheet 1.  Oriented with north to the upper right on some sheets.  Copyright 1894 by the Sanborn-Perris Map Co., Limited.""  ""June 1894.""  ""Copyright, 1909 by the Sanborn Map Company.""  Includes key, streets and ""specials"" indexes, notes, and text.  ""(7287) 5 sheets""--in upper right corner of sheet 1."". Scale approximately 1:600. 50 ft. to an in.
